Name: Hell Madness
About the game: The leaders of the hellish hordes descended to earth and now plunge the world into an abyss of pain and suffering, but the servants of light took the side of the mortals and swore to protect the earth from the sinister hands of the servants of the underworld! Hell Madness is a 2d game with elements of management and Tower Defense, the player has to protect the last stronghold of humanity and resist the forces of evil, buy the powers of light on my side, strengthen the defensive structure and repair, improve the skills of the army of light, call heavenly punishment on the head of hellish warriors and hold on for as long as possible! Game Features: - Original Tower Defense - Upgrade Shop - Multiple levels(each new day)
